error.message.invalid_berth_selection: Not all of the harbours you have selected may have available berths for your type of boat.
error.message.invalid_berth: This harbour is unlikely to have berths for your type of boat.
storybook.dummy.label: dummy
site.berth.title: Boat berth search
site.winter.title: Winter Storage Space
hero.berth.title: Applying for a berth in the boat harbours of the City of Helsinki
hero.berth.paragraph.first: This service allows for you to browse through the boat harbours in Helsinki and submit new applications to the harbours of your choice.
hero.berth.paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting harbours as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning berths and the processing times for applications on the hel.fi website before completing your application.
hero.winter.title: Applying for a Winter Storage Space
hero.winter.paragraph.first: Here you can browse through the winter storage areas for boats in Helsinki and submit a new application to the areas of your choice. Appointed spaces very rarely free up so be sure to select also areas with no appointed spaces for your application.
hero.winter.paragraph.second:
NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting areas as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning spaces and the processing times for applications on the hel.fi website before completing your application.
If you are interested in storing your boat in water over the winter, please contact us for details.
tab_selector.progress.message.zero: Choose a maximum of { total } harbours for your application
tab_selector.progress.message.other: You can still select { count } harbours for your application
tab_selector.progress.message.max: Maximum number of ({ total }) harbours selected
validation.message.must_be_number: The value must be a number
validation.message.must_be_phone_number: The value must be a telephone number
validation.message.must_be_email: The value must be an e-mail address
page.berths.title: Harbour search
legend.berth.title: What type of berths are you looking for?
legend.berth.legend: Browse the harbours and berths offered by the City. Choose up to ten suitable harbours for your application.
legend.selected_berths.title: Review harbours
legend.selected_berths.legend: Review the harbours you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the harbours you have chosen by preference.
legend.boat.title: Boat information
legend.boat.legend: Boat berths are applied for boat-specifically. Please enter the boat information for the boat you are intending to keep in the berth here. You may also apply for a berth even if you do not have a boat as of yet.
legend.person.title: Applicant information
legend.person.legend: Private individuals and companies may apply for berths. Applicants who do not live in Helsinki and companies are charged an increased annual rent.
legend.overview.title: Summary
legend.overview.legend: Please check the accuracy of the information once more before submitting your application.
legend.thankyou.title: Thank you, your application has been sent succesfully!
legend.thankyou.legend.contact_informati:
Helsingin kaupungin venepaikkavaraukset (Berth reservations of the City of Helsinki)
venepaikkavaraukset@hel.fi
Advice over the telephone is available 9–14 Monday–Friday by calling 09 310 87900.
Service hours 9–16 Monday–Friday at Töölö Sports Hall at Paavo Nurmen kuja 1 E.
legend.winter.title: Browse and Select Winter Storage Areas
legend.winter.legend: Submit the details of the boat you will be storing. The list of areas will be filtered according to your specifications. You can also define what services you require from the area.
legend.selected_areas.title: Review storage areas
legend.selected_areas.legend: Review the winter storage areas you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the areas you have chosen by preference.
form.boat_type_selector.company.label: Company or community
form.boat_type_selector.no_boat.label: No boat
form.big_ship.header.title: Spaces for larger vessels
form.big_ship.text.summary: Vessels weighing more than 20,000 kg are moored in designated berths. Berths for larger vessels are reserved either on a fixed-term basis or until further notice.
form.big_ship.text.inspection_and_insura: The inspection certificate and an extract from the insurance policy must be provided prior to berth assignment. The inspection and insurance must remain valid with no interruptions. The lessor has the right to demand that the inspection certificate and the extract from the insurance policy are presented at any time.

page.berth.selected.title: Your selection
page.berth.selected.info_text: Select the type and size of your boat to see if the selected harbour has any available berths.
page.berth.selected.warning.heading: Please note! You have selected harbours with no available berths.
page.berth.selected.alert.strong: Please note! You have not yet selected any harbours.
page.berth.selected.alert.paragraph: Select the desired harbours from the list of harbours.
page.berth.exchange_application.new.info: The applicant does not yet have the boats offered by the City of Helsinki
page.berth.exchange_application.exchange: Exchange of a berth in the port of Helsinki to another port
page.berth.exchange_application.warning: You can choose up to five ports for the exchange application. Please remove the extra options and re-type the application.
page.berth.exchange_application.current_: To submit a switch application please provide the information on your current berth
